cont.entity_a: The N card works great with a Netgear dual band router, allowing internet connection in the garage. The product works well with Rangemax router, maintaining signal better than DLink card. The card worked fine with the old Netgear WiFi 11b system and provided an outstanding signal.
cont.entity_b: Linksys WPC54GX4 adapter is compatible with Linksys wireless router, eliminating previous connection problems. The adapter works with all routers and provides increased range when paired with Linksys WRT54GX4.

cont.entity_a: Installation was easy and took less than 10 minutes, with the card running smoothly for almost two months. Installation was seamless and the card is more sensitive than previous ones, providing smooth and speedy downloads.
cont.entity_b: The adapter is easy to install and set up. Installation was easy, but the card required Linksys software to function.

cont.entity_a: The range and speed are not satisfactory. The card offers great range and works well as advertised, with easy setup.
cont.entity_b: The range is not significantly better than other adapters. The card improved range compared to an older Linksys card. The Linksys card provided better range and signal strength than built-in wireless. The adapter offers long-range connectivity and works excellently.

cont.entity_a: Netgear software should be turned off for better performance, letting Windows control the connection instead. The card caused CPU usage to go to 80% with no known fix, resulting in sluggish performance. The card caused a massive slowdown in PC performance due to high CPU utilization.
cont.entity_b: The adapter caused computer lockups when plugged in. The adapter caused laptops to freeze when booting with it inserted.

cont.entity_a: The product offers faster speed and broader coverage for home networks.
cont.entity_b: The adapter provides great speed and range for a wireless network.

cont.entity_a: The product offers better security with WPA2 and improved connection time.
cont.entity_b: The software is fast and easy, with options for WEP keys.
The adapter picks up signals from a distance, even through walls. The adapter works well with older laptops and provides reliable signal.

cont.entity_a: Technical support was unhelpful, focused on collecting personal information. The adapter was not recognized by the machine, and customer service was unhelpful.
Setup was difficult due to a wrong IP address issue known to the manufacturer.

cont.entity_b: The adapter works well for older laptops without built-in WiFi.
